snippet.title: Modulus Devlog #1: introducing Modulus
snippet.description:
WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2779120/Modulus/

In our first devlog, we’re pulling back the curtain on what makes our factory automation game unique. From the inspiration behind its meditative gameplay to the mechanics of crafting intricate 3D modules as building blocks for your factories, this episode sets the stage for the creative and strategic challenges ahead. Join us as we explore the art of merging space geometry, problem-solving, and player creativity into an experience unlike any other. 

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/QbTr9bFqTF

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Chapters
00:00 Introduction
00:28 Vision
01:04 Core Mechanic
02:17 Like Clockwork
03:26 Art Direction
04:10 Outro
